#summary Find out What's New in the ES operating system projects

= News =

 * *14 December 2012*: esidl 0.2.2 is released, which is required to build escort from trunk at r3250 or later.
 * *2 December 2012*: escort Web Browser 0.2.3 Alpha released. Binary packages for Fedora 17 and Ubuntu 12.10 are now available [http://download.esrille.org/ here].
 * *11 August 2012*: escort Web Browser 0.2.2 Alpha released.
 * *24 July 2012*: escort Web Browser 0.2.1 Alpha released.
 * *1 July 2012*: escort Web Browser 0.2.0 Alpha released. This is the first alpha release including a tarball and binary packages for Fedora 17.
